overview: Assi brings over 12 years of US and international finance experience to Plimus. Prior to joining in 2011 Assi was the CFO at publically-traded Digital Power Corporation (NYSE) and corporate controller at Metalink, Ltd. (NASDAQ). Additionally Assi has extensive audit experience at Deloitte both in the US and in Israel. He is a Certified Public Accountant, holding a B.A. degree in Business Administration and Accountancy from the College for Management and an MBA in Financial Management from Tel-Aviv University.
